metadata.title: Core Agent Documents - kOS Kitchen System
metadata.purpose: Core set of documents that every agent must load for consistent operation

core_document_set.description: These are the essential documents that every agent must load and follow

mandatory_documents.purpose: Permanent, immutable rules that ALL agents must ALWAYS follow
Mandatory standards for documentation, archiving, and handoff processes
Mandatory workflow standards for all agents working on kOS kitchen system
Comprehensive development standards for building the kOS kitchen system
Comprehensive architecture standards for the kOS kitchen system
Comprehensive best practices guide for developing the kOS kitchen system
Standardized template for agent handoffs in the kOS kitchen system
Definitive execution plan for building the kOS kitchen system
Comprehensive Git workflow system documentation and implementation plan
Current handoff document from previous agent

optional_documents.purpose: Current system analysis with critical issues identified
Summary of agents directory cleanup and restructuring

mandatory_steps.action: Load all mandatory documents in order
mandatory_steps.description: Load documents 1-10 in sequence, ensuring each is properly loaded
Check that all documents are consistent and up-to-date

mandatory_steps.action: Load optional documents if they exist
mandatory_steps.description: Load documents 11-12 if they exist and are relevant
Ensure compliance with all loaded documents

validation_requirements: All mandatory documents must be present
All documents must be valid JSON
All documents must have valid timestamps >= 2025-06-15
All required fields must be present

core_document_rules: Core documents should NOT have timestamps in their filenames
Core documents should be updated in place when content changes
Core documents should maintain consistent naming across all agents
Core documents should be versioned internally, not in filename
archiving_rules: Only timestamped documents should be archived
Core documents are never archived, only updated
When core documents are superseded, update the existing file
Maintain single source of truth for each core document type
update_protocol: Update core documents when standards change
Update version number and last_updated timestamp
Ensure all agents are notified of updates

agents_root: ARCHIVE/ - All archived documents and future archive locations
LATEST/ - Current handoff, analysis, and core documents

current_priorities: Fix kitchen system critical issues (see CURRENT_ANALYSIS.json)

special_job_documents.description: Documents for special jobs that are not part of core set
handling: Special job documents should have timestamps in filenames
Special job documents should be archived when job is complete
Special job documents should not remain in LATEST/ permanently
Special job documents should be clearly marked as temporary

on_startup: Load all mandatory core documents in order (1-10)
Load optional documents if they exist and are relevant
Follow all rules and standards from loaded documents
Begin work according to LATEST_HANDOFF.json instructions
during_work: Follow all standards and best practices
Update documents as needed with proper versioning
Create timestamped documents for special tasks
on_handoff: Archive all timestamped documents to appropriate directories
Update core documents if standards have changed
Ensure all work is properly documented and archived

quality_standards.testing: All code must be tested and validated
quality_standards.compliance: Follow all immutable rules without exception
